title: How to Make Baked Fish With Cheese Sauce

steps.headline: Spray a baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.
Add fish fillets to baking dish.
Pour 1/2 cup milk over fish fillets.
Bake 30 minutes, or until fish is cooked through
Make the white sauce by melting the butter, adding the flour, salt and pepper.
steps.description: Whisk in the 1 cup milk and cook until sauce is smooth and thickened. Keep warm.

steps.headline: Remove baked fish from oven after the baking time has finished.
Sprinkle grated cheese over top of sauce and fish.

text: Preheat oven to 350 to 375 °F (177 to 191 °C).  Spray a baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.  Add fish fillets to baking dish.  Pour 1/2 cup milk over fish fillets.  Bake 30 minutes, or until fish is cooked through  Make the white sauce by melting the butter, adding the flour, salt and pepper. Whisk in the 1 cup milk and cook until sauce is smooth and thickened. Keep warm. Whisk in the sherry.  Remove baked fish from oven after the baking time has finished.  Nap with white sauce.  Sprinkle grated cheese over top of sauce and fish.  Broil until golden.  Finished.
